house1.property_details: Spacious one bedroom coop located in the Fieldston area of Riverdale. Unit offers a large bedroom, eat in kitchen, a sizable living room, a wide entry foyer which currently holds a convenient built in closet. High ceilings, plenty of storage space and more. The unit is within an Art Deco building that proudly displays the artistic architecture and features of its time. Some of its amenities includes, two convenient separate entrances on Waldo Avenue and Dash Place, indoor children play space, indoor gymnasium, two full time elevators, large shared laundry space and much more.

house2.seller: Robert Laferlita with Keller Williams Rlty Landmark
house2.address: 18-35 Corporal Kennedy St Unit 6C, Bayside, NY 1136
house2.property_details: BRIGHT SPACIOUS TOP FLOOR 2 BR 1BATH APARTMENT, CUSTOM RENOVATION 51 HIGH HATS, 13 7FEET HIGH DOORS, OFFICE, WOOD FLOORS, GRANITE KITCHEN COUNTER TOPS, STAINLESS STEELE APPLIANCES, SKIN COATING andCUSTOM WINDOW TREATMENTS....LOOK AT PHOTO's

house3.seller: Larry Cricchio with Realty Executives Metro
house3.property_details: Welcome to 8735 Bay Parkway Apt. 51A, a Junior 4 Co-op. The unit has been completely re-furbished, with new bath, kitchen, appliances. doors, flooring and freshly painted. Nothing to be done except move right in. This unit is on the fifth floor of a six story building, one the of the best maintained and financially sound buildings in Bath Beach and Bensonhurst, centrally located near all, transportation (Belt Parkway for easy access to Queens, Long Island and NYC), subway (D line, Bay Parkway stop), buses, (Bay Parkway Bus, Cropsey Avenue Bus), shopping (86th Street Hub), walking distance to Caesar's Bay, the gateway to NYC harbor, with walking, running and bicycle lanes plus a spectacular view of the Verrazano Bridge and the shipping activity in and out of NYC. The unit features four rooms with a large master bedroom, kitchen with eating area, living room and spare optional room for office, study, playroom etc. Low monthly maintenance fee includes heat and hot water. The unit is vacant and ready for its new owner.

house4.property_details: Come And View This Large 1 Bedroom 1 Bath On Second Floor Garden Apartment. Unit Is All Updated With Crown Moldings, Hardwood Floors, Updated Kitchen W/ Stainless Steel Appliances And Quartz Counter Tops. Also Includes Stand Up Attic. Includes Washer/Dryer. Plenty Of Closet Space And Stand Up Attic For Added Storage.

house5.property_details: This beautiful 3-bedroom, 2 bath Townhouse End-Unit is turn-key and is in one of the best locations in the Aspen Knolls community. This immaculate home offers a Family Room with a sliding door, which leads to a common yard, which is basically private. The home has a 1 Car Garage which is surrounded by on-street parking. The community offer many amenities, the Common Areas include an In-ground Pool, Clubhouse, Tennis Court, Basketball Court and Playground. The development is conveniently located to Public Transportation, including Express Buses and Stores. Aspen Knolls has it All, this home will not last!

house6.seller: Meijuan (Minnie) Lin, Momentum Real Estate Llc
house6.address: 8320 Bay Pkwy Apt C11, Brooklyn, NY 11214
house6.property_details: Introducing this opportunity to own this coop unit located in the prime neighborhood of Bensonhurst. This is a well kept coop with state of art appliances along with hardwood flooring. The unit features 1 living room, 1 bedroom and 1 full bathroom. The property is located conveniently in walking distance of the busy Bay Parkway and 86th St. There are an abundant of restaurants, supermarkets, cafes, gyms and shops to explore. There are also an abundant of public transportation options available in walking distance including: the D train via the Bay Parkway stop, B1, B6, B82 and B82-SBS. The unit is zoned to a fantastic middle school I.S. 281 Joseph B Cavallaro.

house7.seller: Anthony Testani with Keller Williams Rlty Landmark
house7.property_details: Gorgeous Junior 4 in Prime Bay Terrace. Nestled on the 5th Floor, This Renovated 950 Square Foot Unit Offers a Huge Foyer, Oversized Living Room, L Shape Dining Room, New Kitchen with Granite Counters, Pantry, Custom Cabinets, & Stainless Steel Appliances, Long Hall with Closets Galore, Large Bedroom, Renovated Bath, Onsite Laundry, Parking Spot, & Beautiful All Season Views, Just Move In!

house8.property_details: Newly Listed!! Sun-Drenched Corner 2 Bedroom 1 Bath w/ South East Unobstructed Exposures, Newly Renovated Bathroom and Windowed Kitchen in The Anita Terrace!! ALL UTILITIES are INCLUDED in the MAINTENANCE --- ELECTRIC TOO!!! The Apartment This thoughtfully renovated 2 Bedroom 1 Bath is drenched in sunlight. You enter the unit into the open dining area which overlooks the generously sized living room. This space is so generous that the current owners double its usage as both a living room and an impressive workspace. To your immediate right is a short hallway to a newly-renovated windowed bathroom with bathtub and the very large master bedroom. The master, always drenched in sunlight, has enough space for a king-size bed and full bedroom furniture suite with spacious closets. Back down the short hall and on your immediate right is the kitchen. The Kitchen has stainless steel appliances and granite kitchen counters as well as a dishwasher. It also has a large window with an unobstructed view and, again, an abundance of natural light. There is also space for a pantry. Back out of the kitchen and to the right again is the living room with enough space for a corner sofa, ottoman, coffee table and entertainment center. Beyond the open living area is an ideal area for a workstation. If you do not work from home, the living room becomes truly gigantic! Finally, the hidden gem at the back of the apartment is the 2nd bedroom. This is the corner room with huge windows making it the brightest room of the apartment. This could also be used as an amazing home office! Hardwood floors throughout this lovely 2 bedroom apartment. Building The Anita Terrace is a wonderful Co-op in the heart of Rego Park, a primary jewel in the crown of Queens!! Anita Terrace is a Doorman building with 24-hour security. There is a fantastic New Gym with state-of-the-art equipment including multiple treadmills and free weight station. They have a large laundry room and their best kept secret outside - a private playground for your little ones! The building has become pet friendly and welcomes small dogs and cats. There is also a separately owned parking facility on site. Neighborhood Rego Park has fantastic train access to the city including the E/F/R/M. The Queens Mall is right up the road with more shops than you shake a stick at and then you have Austin street just over Queens Blvd with more restaurants than you can shake another stick at! One final word to leave you with regarding the neighborhood --- Costco!!
